title: Former Twitter Executives Sue for Unpaid Fees
description: The erstwhile CEO, CFO and legal chief claim the social-media platform owes them more than $1 million in legal expenses.

title: Social-Media Platform Discord Emerges at Center of Classified U.S. Documents Leak
description: The company started as an online space for gamers to gather and has grown to attract all sorts of users.

title: PC Shipments Fall 29%, Led by Drop in Apple Devices
description: The industry is grappling with a pandemic-driven glut in inventory.

title: Twitter Changes NPR's Account to 'Government Funded Media' After Backlash
description: The platform last week called NPR ‘US state-affiliated media,’ a designation often given to government-influenced outlets.
